lines.text: Back in the 1990's a crisis hit the world... of such proportions, that every country on Earth was in danger of being annihilated. At first the conflict between the United States, Russia and China was inevitable. The populations of all countries were being decimated; and the culprit? No one seemed to know. It wasn't famine or disease, and it wasn't war.

In the meantime, somewhere in space, the Intergalactic Patrol, whose function is to keep order amongst the planets, has already reported the Earth's crisis to its leaders, and an emergency meeting of the Intergalactic Council was called.
